item.title: 南航将兑现因故障而售出的 1.30 美元机票
item.description:
Chinese carrier China Southern Airlines (600029.SS) said on Thursday it would honor the sale of tickets priced as cheaply as $1.30 during a two-hour technical glitch on its mobile phone app and some ticket-booking platforms late on Wednesday.翻译:中国南方航空（600029.SS）周四表示，周三晚间其手机应用程序和一些订票平台出现了两小时的技术故障，该公司将接受低价至 1.30 美元的机票销售。

Consumers began reporting on Chinese social media at around 8 p.m. (1200 GMT) on Wednesday that many flights to and from the southwest metropolis of Chengdu were available at 10, 20 or 30 yuan ($1.37-$4.12) on China Southern's app. One screenshot circulating online showed a ticket from Chengdu to Beijing priced at only 10 yuan, compared to the normal minimum price of 400 to 500 yuan. Other online screenshots indicated the cheap prices were offered for about two hours on the carrier's app as well as across several ticket-booking platforms, including market leader Trip.com.翻译:周三晚上 8 点左右（格林威治标准时间 1200 点），消费者开始在中国社交媒体上报道称，在南航应用程序上，许多往返西南大都市成都的航班票价为 10 元、20 元或 30 元（1.37 美元至 4.12 美元）。网上流传的一张截图显示，从成都到北京的机票价格仅为10元，而正常最低票价为400至500元。其他在线屏幕截图显示，该航空公司的应用程序以及包括市场领导者 Trip.com 在内的多个机票预订平台都提供了大约两个小时的便宜价格。

On top of that price, buyers were required to pay at least an additional 110 yuan in airport fees and fuel surcharges. "Passengers can use them as normal," Guangzhou-based China Southern said, on the proviso that tickets were already paid for and issued.翻译:除此之外，买家还需额外支付至少110元的机场费和燃油附加费。总部位于广州的南航表示，“乘客可以正常使用它们”，但前提是机票已经付款并出票。

($1 = 7.2852 Chinese yuan renminbi)翻译:（1 美元 = 7.2852 人民币）

Reporting by Sophie Yu and Casey Hall; Editing by Bernadette Baum翻译:Sophie Yu 和 Casey Hall 报道；伯纳黛特·鲍姆编辑

item.title: 俄罗斯普京在哈萨克斯坦会谈小麦、化肥和物流
item.description:
Russian President Vladimir Putin called for the development of wheat and fertiliser cargo transport routes in Asia during a visit to Kazakhstan on Thursday, as Russia seeks to forge new export routes due to Western sanctions.翻译:俄罗斯总统弗拉基米尔·普京周四在访问哈萨克斯坦期间呼吁发展亚洲小麦和化肥货运路线，因为俄罗斯因西方制裁而寻求建立新的出口路线。

Chairing a conference on agricultural cooperation with Kazakh President Tokayev, Putin said Russia would have about 60 million metric tons of wheat available for exports from this year's strong crop.翻译:普京在与哈萨克斯坦总统托卡耶夫主持召开的农业合作会议上表示，由于今年的丰收，俄罗斯将有约6000万吨小麦可供出口。

"We are confident, certainly, that we will retain the No.1 spot globally in terms of exports of this important commodity, wheat," Putin said.翻译:普京表示：“我们当然有信心，在小麦这一重要商品的出口方面，我们将保持全球第一的地位。”

He called for further development of shipping routes to large Asian markets such as China and India.翻译:他呼吁进一步开发通往中国和印度等亚洲大市场的航线。

Western sanctions on Russian banks and companies have made it it more difficult for Russian exporters to ship grains and arrange payments, although the sanctions do not specifically target such commodities.翻译:西方对俄罗斯银行和公司的制裁使俄罗斯出口商运输谷物和安排付款变得更加困难，尽管制裁并未专门针对此类商品。

Moscow has also reportedly asked exporters to adopt a minimum wheat export price in order to protect farmers' income, though the functioning of the semi-official scheme is unclear.翻译:据报道，莫斯科还要求出口商采用最低小麦出口价格，以保护农民的收入，但半官方计划的运作情况尚不清楚。

Kazakhstan, in turn, is seeking to become a logistics hub for Russian commodities bound for China and Iran, officials say. The country already operates a railroad link between Russia and China and has a railroad connection with Iran along the Caspian.翻译:官员们表示，哈萨克斯坦正在寻求成为运往中国和伊朗的俄罗斯商品的物流中心。该国已经在俄罗斯和中国之间运营了一条铁路，并沿着里海与伊朗建立了铁路连接。

Thursday's visit was Putin's third known trip abroad since the Hague-based International Criminal Court (ICC) issued an arrest warrant in March for the Russian leader on war crime charges, something the Kremlin strongly rejects.翻译:周四的访问是自总部位于海牙的国际刑事法院（ICC）三月份以战争罪指控对俄罗斯领导人发出逮捕令以来普京第三次出访，但克里姆林宫强烈拒绝了这一指控。

Kazakhstan, like China and Kyrgyzstan, the two other countries Putin has visited recently, is not a signatory to the ICC.翻译:哈萨克斯坦与普京最近访问的另外两个国家中国和吉尔吉斯斯坦一样，都不是国际刑事法院的签署国。

The ICC, which accused Putin of illegally deporting children from Ukraine, obliges the court's 123 member states to arrest Putin and transfer him to The Hague for trial if he sets foot on their territory.翻译:国际刑事法院指控普京从乌克兰非法驱逐儿童，并要求该法院的 123 个成员国逮捕普京，如果他踏上其领土，请将他移交给海牙接受审判。

Kazakhstan's Tokayev, a career diplomat, has carefully maintained neutrality in the Russia-West stand-off, and welcomed Putin just a week after hosting French President Emmanuel Macron. A United States delegation led by a senior State Department official visited Astana this week.翻译:哈萨克斯坦职业外交官托卡耶夫在俄罗斯与西方的对峙中谨慎地保持中立，并在接待法国总统埃马纽埃尔·马克龙一周后欢迎普京。由国务院高级官员率领的美国代表团本周访问了阿斯塔纳。

Reporting by Tamara Vaal Writing by Olzhas Auyezov; editing by Guy Faulconbridge翻译:塔玛拉·瓦尔 (Tamara Vaal) 的报道；奥尔扎斯·奥耶佐夫 (Olzhas Auyezov) 撰文；盖伊·福尔肯布里奇编辑

item.title: 美国财政部长耶伦与中国国务院副总理将在APEC会议前摩擦中会面
item.description:
U.S. Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen opens two days of meetings with Chinese Vice Premier He Lifeng on Thursday in a bid to limit the economic fallout from a tense relationship by keeping open the lines of communications on topics from national security to climate change.翻译:美国财政部长珍妮特·耶伦周四开始与中国国务院副总理何立峰举行为期两天的会议，旨在通过就国家安全和气候变化等话题保持开放的沟通渠道来限制紧张关系造成的经济影响。

U.S. Treasury officials have sought to downplay expectations for any breakthroughs from the meetings in San Francisco, where the U.S. President Joe Biden next week will host a summit of Asia Pacific Econoimc Cooperation country leaders, including Chinese President Xi Jinping.翻译:美国财政部官员试图淡化对旧金山会议取得任何突破的预期，美国总统乔·拜登下周将在旧金山主持亚太经合组织国家领导人峰会，其中包括中国国家主席习近平。

Biden and Xi are expected to steal APEC's spotlight with a planned meeting on the summit sidelines. Yellen's second face-to-face meeting with He since she visited Beijing in July is among a series of cabinet-level engagements aimed in part at securing the two leaders' meeting.翻译:预计拜登和习近平将在峰会间隙举行计划中的会晤，从而抢尽亚太经合组织的焦点。耶伦自7月访问北京以来与贺建奎的第二次面对面会面是一系列内阁级别的接触之一，部分目的是确保两国领导人会面。

Yellen intends to reiterate her view that the U.S. and China cannot decouple and instead must pursue a "healthy competition" based on a level playing field and clear communications about their intentions regarding national security restrictions.翻译:耶伦打算重申她的观点，即美国和中国不能脱钩，而必须在公平竞争环境和就国家安全限制意图进行明确沟通的基础上追求“良性竞争”。

She said last week that the Biden administration would not choose a path of separation that would force Asian economies to choose between China and the U.S.翻译:她上周表示，拜登政府不会选择一条迫使亚洲经济体在中美之间做出选择的分裂道路。

Her San Francisco meetings will mark the first in-person gatherings of new U.S.-China economic and financial forums involving staff-level officials from both sides after the bodies were launched in October.翻译:她在旧金山举行的会议将标志着新的美中经济和金融论坛自十月份成立以来，双方官员级官员的首次面对面聚会。

But in announcing the consultations, Yellen said this would not be a recreation of the Obama-era Strategic and Economic Dialogue, a broad U.S.-China forum that was widely criticized for its ineffectiveness.翻译:但耶伦在宣布磋商时表示，这不会是奥巴马时代战略与经济对话的重演，这是一个广泛的美中论坛，因其效率低下而受到广泛批评。

A U.S. Treasury official said that a key goal for the meeting was deepening communications with China, gaining a better understanding of the relationship, and avoiding any misunderstandings about U.S. policy decisions.

'FRACTURED' RELATIONSHIP

Kelly Ann Shaw, a former White House trade adviser to former president Donald Trump, said it was important for Yellen to re-engage with China, but that the meeting would do little to change the overall trajectory of U.S.-China relations.翻译:前总统唐纳德·特朗普的前白宫贸易顾问凯莉·安·肖表示，耶伦重新与中国接触很重要，但此次会面对改变美中关系的整体轨迹无济于事。

"This relationship is fundamentally fractured. And I think it's going to stay that way for the foreseeable future," said Shaw, a partner at the Hogan Lovells law firm.翻译:霍金路伟律师事务所合伙人肖说：“这种关系从根本上破裂了。我认为在可预见的未来，这种关系仍将保持这种状态。”

"So it's about figuring out, what do we want this relationship to look like knowing that? And just because you don't like each other doesn't mean you can't get along where your interests align."翻译:“所以关键是弄清楚，知道这一点后，我们希望这种关系是什么样子？仅仅因为你们不喜欢对方，并不意味着你们不能在利益一致的情况下相处。”

Yellen said in an opinion piece published by the Washington Post on Monday that global challenges presented areas for potential U.S.-China cooperation, including climate change, debt relief for poor countries and stemming illicit financial flows to terrorism and illegal drugs.翻译:耶伦在《华盛顿邮报》周一发表的一篇评论文章中表示，全球挑战为美中潜在的合作领域提供了机会，包括气候变化、减免穷国债务以及阻止非法资金流向恐怖主义和非法毒品。

But she also said she would raise U.S. objections to Chinese state subsidies and other economic policies.翻译:但她也表示，她将向美国提出对中国国家补贴和其他经济政策的反对意见。

"This week, I will speak to my counterpart about our serious concerns with Beijing's unfair economic practices, including its large-scale use of non-market tools, its barriers to market access, and its coercive actions against U.S. firms in China," Yellen wrote.翻译:耶伦表示：“本周，我将与我的同行谈论我们对北京不公平经济行为的严重关切，包括大规模使用非市场工具、市场准入壁垒以及对在华美国企业采取的强制行动。”写道。

Reporting by David Lawder; Editing by Angus MacSwan翻译:大卫·劳德报道；安格斯·麦克斯旺编辑

item.title: 缅甸总统：国家面临因冲突而分裂的风险
item.description:
The president of military-ruled Myanmar has said the country is at risk of breaking apart due to ineffective management of recent violence in its border regions with China.翻译:军政府统治的缅甸总统表示，由于对最近与中国边境地区发生的暴力事件管理不力，该国面临分裂的风险。

The Myanmar junta is facing the biggest challenge to its authority since it seized power in a 2021 coup, with a surge in attacks by pro-democracy and ethnic minority insurgents on junta bases in the north, northeast, northwest and southeast.翻译:缅甸军政府正面临自2021年政变夺权以来的最大挑战，亲民主派和少数民族叛乱分子对北部、东北部、西北和东南部军政府基地的袭击激增。

"If the government does not effectively manage the incidents happening in the border region, the country will be split into various parts," Myint Swe, president of the State Administration Council, told a national defence and security council meeting.翻译:国家行政委员会主席敏瑞在国防和安全委员会会议上表示：“如果政府不能有效管理边境地区发生的事件，国家将分裂成不同的部分。”

"It is necessary to carefully control this issue. As now is an important time for the state, the entire people need to support Tatmadaw," he said, referring to the military.翻译:“有必要谨慎控制这个问题。现在对国家来说是一个重要时刻，全体人民需要支持缅军，”他指的是军队。

The military has for decades insisted that it is the only institution capable of holding the diverse former British colony together, using that argument to justify its grip on power and to crush opposition.翻译:几十年来，军方一直坚称，它是唯一有能力将这个多元化的前英国殖民地团结在一起的机构，并利用这一论点来证明其掌握权力的合理性并镇压反对派。

Myanmar has been in turmoil since the 2021 coup when the generals ousted an elected government led by democracy champion Aung San Suu Kyi, bringing an end to 10 years of tentative reform after decades of strict military rule.翻译:自2021年政变以来，缅甸一直处于动荡之中，当时将军们推翻了民主斗士昂山素季领导的民选政府，结束了数十年严格军事统治后长达10年的试探性改革。

The junta has in recent days lost control of some trading towns on the border with China to an alliance of guerrilla factions.翻译:最近几天，军政府失去了对一些与中国接壤的贸易城镇的控制权，让给游击队联盟。

There have also been numerous reports of clashes elsewhere between the military and opposition fighters. Reuters had not been able to verify those reports.翻译:还有大量关于军队和反对派武装人员在其他地方发生冲突的报道。路透社无法核实这些报道。

China confirmed this week that there had been Chinese casualties because of firing from the Myanmar fighting spilling over onto China's side of the border.翻译:中国本周证实，由于缅甸战斗的炮火蔓延到中国一侧边境，造成了中国人伤亡。

China's foreign ministry on Thursday urged its citizens to stay away from areas with "fierce conflicts" and avoid travelling to Myanmar.翻译:中国外交部周四敦促中国公民远离“激烈冲突”地区，避免前往缅甸。

"Chinese citizens who have already been in the local areas of intense conflict should pay close attention to the development of the situation and move to safety or return to China," the ministry said in a statement.翻译:外交部在一份声明中表示：“已身处当地冲突激烈地区的中国公民应密切关注事态发展，及时撤离或返回中国。”

China has extensive economic interests in Myanmar.翻译:中国在缅甸拥有广泛的经济利益。

An assistant Chinese foreign minister, Nong Rong, called on Myanmar during a visit last week to cooperate with China to maintain border stability. He also asked for measures to protect Chinese interests.翻译:中国外交部部长助理农融在上周访问缅甸期间呼吁缅甸与中国合作维护边境稳定。他还要求采取措施保护中国利益。

Reporting by Reuters staff, additional reporting by Bernard Orr in Beijing; Writing by Kanupriya Kapoor; Editing by Muralikumar Anantharaman and Michael Perry翻译:路透社工作人员的报道，伯纳德·奥尔在北京的补充报道；卡努普里亚·卡普尔 (Kanupriya Kapoor) 撰写；穆拉利库马尔·阿南塔拉曼和迈克尔·佩里编辑

item.title: 亚太经合组织峰会前夕，印度-太平洋地区贸易协议争夺战遭遇阻碍
item.description:
The Biden administration is aiming to show that its key Asian economic initiative is making progress as Pacific Rim leaders gather in San Francisco next week, but significant holes remain on trade-related chapters, people familiar with the talks say.翻译:知情人士称，随着环太平洋地区领导人下周齐聚旧金山，拜登政府的目标是表明其关键的亚洲经济举措正在取得进展，但与贸易相关的章节仍存在重大漏洞。

Negotiators from 14 countries are racing to close out chapters of the Indo-Pacific Economic Framework for Prosperity in hastily arranged talks this week, with announcements expected on cooperation to accelerate the clean energy transition and to fight corruption and tax evasion.翻译:来自 14 个国家的谈判代表在本周仓促安排的会谈中竞相结束印太经济繁荣框架的各个章节，预计将宣布合作加速清洁能源转型以及打击腐败和逃税。

U.S. President Joe Biden is keen to portray IPEF as producing meaningful outcomes to leaders of Asia Pacific Economic Cooperation countries, as he seeks to offer them a U.S.-led alternative to deeper economic ties to China.翻译:美国总统乔·拜登热衷于将IPEF描绘为为亚太经合组织国家领导人带来有意义的成果，因为他寻求为他们提供一个由美国主导的替代方案，以加深与中国的经济联系。

When the administration launched the IPEF negotiations in 2023, it made clear that the U.S.-hosted APEC summit was a key deadline, "and that has raised expectations," said Wendy Cutler, a former U.S. trade negotiator who now heads the Asia Society Policy Center in Washington.翻译:美国前贸易谈判代表、现任亚洲协会政策中心负责人温迪·卡特勒 (Wendy Cutler) 表示，当政府于 2023 年启动 IPEF 谈判时，明确表示美国主办的 APEC 峰会是一个关键最后期限，“这提高了人们的预期”在华盛顿。

"The importance of this is to show that the U.S. is stepping up, through APEC and IPEF, to say 'we're back in Asia and we're going to remain a close economic partner,'" Cutler said.

NOT TPP

The Trump administration abandoned the 12-country Trans-Pacific Partnership (TPP) free trade deal in 2017, but IPEF is far more limited in scope, foregoing traditional tariff reductions and other market access improvements. Instead it promised cooperation on supply chains and clean energy along with higher standards for labor, environment and regulatory practices and digital trade.翻译:特朗普政府于 2017 年放弃了 12 个国家的跨太平洋伙伴关系 (TPP) 自由贸易协议，但 IPEF 的范围要有限得多，放弃了传统的关税削减和其他市场准入改进。相反，它承诺在供应链和清洁能源方面进行合作，并在劳动力、环境、监管实践和数字贸易方面提出更高的标准。

Countries participating in IPEF are Australia, Brunei, Fiji, India, Indonesia, Japan, South Korea, Malaysia, New Zealand, the Philippines, Singapore, Thailand, Vietnam and the United States. All but India and Fiji are also members of APEC.翻译:参加IPEF的国家有澳大利亚、文莱、斐济、印度、印度尼西亚、日本、韩国、马来西亚、新西兰、菲律宾、新加坡、泰国、越南和美国。除印度和斐济外，所有国家都是亚太经合组织成员。

Only one of the four IPEF "pillars," on strengthening supply chains, has a completed text, with deals reached in May on an early warning system for potential supply disruptions like those seen after the pandemic, as well as a council to consult on supply chain issues such as those involving national security or critical economic sectors.翻译:IPEF 关于加强供应链的四个“支柱”中只有一个拥有完整的文本，并于 5 月份就针对潜在供应中断（如大流行后出现的情况）的预警系统达成了协议，并成立了一个供应磋商委员会涉及国家安全或关键经济部门的连锁问题。

People familiar with the talks say that two other pillars led by the Commerce Department are likely to reach substantial conclusion in the next week with announcements on boosting cooperation on de-carbonization efforts and to combat corruption and tax evasion.

DIGITAL SHIFT

The trade pillar has proven more difficult, with many countries not willing to meet U.S. demands to meet certain labor and environmental standards or needing more time to consider them, three people familiar with the talks said.翻译:三名知情人士表示，事实证明，贸易支柱更加困难，许多国家不愿意满足美国提出的某些劳工和环境标准的要求，或者需要更多时间来考虑这些标准。

Negotiations on digital trade standards -- once seen as a marquee feature of the IPEF trade pillar -- are largely frozen as the Biden administration has suspended discussions on key rules after reversing longstanding U.S. positions on e-commerce.翻译:数字贸易标准的谈判一度被视为 IPEF 贸易支柱的一个重要特征，但由于拜登政府在扭转了美国在电子商务方面的长期立场后暂停了对关键规则的讨论，因此基本上被冻结。

The U.S. Trade Representative's office last month dropped its insistence on rules to protect free cross-border data flows and to prohibit national requirements for data localization and reviews of software source code, arguing that the change was needed to give Congress room to enact stronger regulations on large technology firms. The move has pleased liberal democrats who want to rein in Big Tech but angered many business groups.翻译:美国贸易代表办公室上个月放弃了对保护自由跨境数据流动和禁止数据本地化和软件源代码审查的国家要求的坚持，认为需要进行这一改变，以便国会有空间制定更严格的法规大型科技公司。此举让想要控制大型科技公司的自由民主党人感到高兴，但也激怒了许多商业团体。

"It's tough. By adopting these fringe views on digital trade, USTR really brings the main substance on digital trade to a halt," said John Murphy, senior vice president for international policy for the U.S. Chamber of Commerce.翻译:美国商会负责国际政策的高级副总裁约翰·墨菲（John Murphy）表示：“这很艰难。通过对数字贸易采取这些边缘观点，美国贸易代表办公室实际上使数字贸易的主要内容陷入停滞。”

But the Biden administration remains determined to announce some agreements on the trade pillar, with the most likely deals seen in the area of trade facilitation measures, such adoption of digital customs forms and electronic signature standards.翻译:但拜登政府仍然决心宣布一些关于贸易支柱的协议，最有可能达成的协议是贸易便利化措施领域，例如采用数字海关表格和电子签名标准。

One of the sources familiar with the talks said that early enthusiasm on the IPEF trade pillar -- which excludes India -- has given way to frustration over the difficulty and complexity of issues involved.翻译:一位熟悉谈判情况的消息人士表示，早期对 IPEF 贸易支柱（不包括印度）的热情已经被对所涉及问题的难度和复杂性的挫败感所取代。

"Trade negotiations take a long time, even when you're offering market access," said Cutler, who was USTR's lead negotiator on TPP a decade ago. "But when you're not offering market access, the onus is more on the demander -- in this case, the United States -- to show these other countries that there are benefits."翻译:十年前担任美国贸易代表办公室 TPP 首席谈判代表的卡特勒表示：“即使提供市场准入，贸易谈判也需要很长时间。” “但是，当你不提供市场准入时，需求者（在这种情况下是美国）就有更多的责任向其他国家表明存在好处。”

Reporting by David Lawder; Editing by Sharon Singleton翻译:大卫·劳德报道；莎朗·辛格尔顿编辑

item.title: 英伟达计划向中国发布三款新芯片 - 当地媒体
item.description:
Nvidia (NVDA.O) is planning to release three new chips for China, local media reported on Thursday, weeks after the U.S. blocked it from selling two high-end artificial intelligence (AI) chips and one of its top gaming chips to Chinese firms.翻译:据当地媒体周四报道，英伟达(NVDA.O)计划向中国发布三款新芯片，几周前美国禁止该公司向中国公司出售两款高端人工智能 (AI) 芯片和一款顶级游戏芯片。 。

The STAR Market Daily news outlet, citing people familiar with the matter, said that the chips are called the HGX H20, L20 PCIe and L2 PCIe and that Nvidia could announce them on Nov. 16 at the earliest.翻译:STAR Market Daily 新闻媒体援引知情人士的话称，这些芯片被称为 HGX H20、L20 PCIe 和 L2 PCIe，Nvidia 最早可能会在 11 月 16 日发布。

Nvidia declined to comment when asked about the report.翻译:当被问及该报告时，英伟达拒绝置评。

Last month, the U.S. AI chip giant said new export restrictions announced by Washington would block it from selling two of its modified advanced AI chips - the A800 and H800 - both of which were created for the Chinese market last year to comply with previous export rules.翻译:上个月，这家美国人工智能芯片巨头表示，华盛顿宣布的新出口限制将阻止其销售两款经过修改的先进人工智能芯片——A800和H800——这两款芯片都是去年为中国市场创建的，以遵守之前的出口规则。

One of the company's top-of-the-line gaming chips, the L40S chip, which it announced in August, would also be affected, it said.翻译:该公司表示，该公司的顶级游戏芯片之一 L40S 芯片（8 月推出）也将受到影响。

On Oct. 24, Nvidia said those curbs would take immediate effect, as U.S. regulators had sped up an original deadline.翻译:10 月 24 日，英伟达表示，这些限制措施将立即生效，因为美国监管机构已经加快了原定的最后期限。

Nvidia has commanded more than 90% share of China's $7 billion AI chip market, and analysts have said the U.S. curbs are likely to create opportunities for domestic firms such as Huawei Technologies (HWT.UL) to make inroads.翻译:英伟达占据了中国 70 亿美元人工智能芯片市场 90% 以上的份额，分析师表示，美国的限制措施可能会为华为技术有限公司 (HWT.UL) 等国内公司创造进入市场的机会。

Chinese internet giant Baidu (9888.HK) placed a sizeable order for Huawei AI chips this year, sources have said. One said Baidu had done so before the U.S. curbs were announced as it was preparing for a future when it would no longer be able to purchase from Nvidia.翻译:消息人士称，中国互联网巨头百度（9888.HK）今年向华为人工智能芯片下了相当大的订单。一位人士表示，百度在美国宣布限制措施之前就已经这样做了，因为它正在为未来不再能够从英伟达购买产品做准备。

Reporting by Brenda Goh; Editing by Christopher Cushing and Edwina Gibbs翻译:布伦达·吴报道；克里斯托弗·库欣和埃德温娜·吉布斯编辑

item.title: 中国11月新增人民币贷款回落，政策支持到位 - 路透调查
item.description:
Summary:
  • Oct new loans seen at 665 bln yuan vs 2.31 trln yuan in Sept
  • Oct money supply growth seen at 10.3% y/y vs 10.3% in Sept
  • Oct TSF seen at 1.90 trln yuan vs 4.12 trln yuan in Sept
  • Loans, money supply data due Nov 10-15
翻译:概括：
  • 10 月新增贷款 6,650 亿元人民币，9 月新增贷款 23.1 万亿元
  • 10 月份货币供应量同比增长 10.3%，9 月份为 10.3%
  • 10 月 TSF 为 1.90 里拉人民币，9 月为 4.12 里拉人民币
  • 贷款、货币供应数据将于 11 月 10 日至 15 日到期

China's new yuan loans are expected to dip in October from the previous month because of seasonal factors, a Reuters poll showed, but the expected lending may exceed the year-earlier amount as the central bank sought to spur economic growth.翻译:路透调查显示，受季节性因素影响，中国10月份新增人民币贷款预计将环比下降，但由于央行寻求刺激经济增长，预计贷款额可能会超过去年同期。

Chinese banks are estimated to have issued 665 billion yuan ($91.29 billion) in net new yuan loans last month, less than a third of the 2.31 trillion yuan in September, according to the median estimate in the survey of 26 economists.翻译:根据对 26 名经济学家的调查的中值估计，上个月中国的银行估计发放了 6650 亿元人民币（合 912.9 亿美元）的新人民币贷款净额，不到 9 月份 2.31 万亿元人民币的三分之一。

But the expected tally would be still higher than the 615.2 billion yuan issued in the same month a year earlier.翻译:但预计发行总额仍高于去年同期发行的6152亿元人民币。

"October has always been a low season for new credit, and this year should be no exception," analysts at Citi said in a note.翻译:花旗分析师在一份报告中表示：“十月一直是新增信贷的淡季，今年也不例外。”

"Mortgage repricing effective at end-September could ease household early repayment pressures. Corporate borrowing could enjoy some support from improving profitability and bottoming exports, but we don't expect a buoyant number either."翻译:“9月底生效的抵押贷款重新定价可以缓解家庭提前还款的压力。企业借贷可能会因盈利能力提高和出口触底而得到一些支持，但我们预计数字也不会强劲。”

Beijing has been ramping up measures to support the economy, including 1 trillion yuan ($137.43 billion) in sovereign bond issuances and allowing local governments to frontload part of their 2024 bond quotas.翻译:北京一直在加大支持经济的措施，包括发行1万亿元人民币（1374.3亿美元）的主权债券，并允许地方政府提前加载2024年的部分债券配额。

But a property crisis, local debt risks and policy divergences with the West are all complicating the recovery process, highlighted by persistent deflationary pressures.翻译:但房地产危机、地方债务风险以及与西方的政策分歧都使复苏进程复杂化，持续的通货紧缩压力凸显了这一点。

The People's Bank of China (PBOC), which has delivered modest interest rate cuts and pumped out more cash into the economy in recent months, has pledged to keep policy supports.翻译:近几个月来，中国人民银行（PBOC）小幅降息并向经济注入更多现金，并承诺维持政策支持。

In September, the PBOC cut banks' reserve requirement ratio for the second time this year, and analysts expect another cut in the coming weeks.翻译:9月，中国人民银行今年第二次下调银行存款准备金率，分析师预计未来几周将再次下调。

China is expected to hit its annual growth target this year, and the country must transform its growth model to pursue high-quality and sustainable expansion, PBOC Governor Pan Gongsheng said on Wednesday.翻译:中国人民银行行长潘功胜周三表示，中国今年预计将实现全年增长目标，中国必须转变增长方式，实现高质量、可持续增长。

Outstanding yuan loans were expected to increase in October by 10.9% from a year earlier, the same as in September, the poll showed. Broad M2 money supply growth in October was seen at 10.3%, unchanged from September.翻译:调查显示，10月份人民币贷款余额预计同比增长10.9%，与9月份持平。 10 月份广义 M2 货币供应量增速为 10.3%，与 9 月份持平。

Local governments are allowed to issue 3.8 trillion yuan in special bonds this year to fund infrastructure projects to bolster the economy.翻译:今年允许地方政府发行3.8万亿元专项债券，为基础设施项目提供资金以提振经济。

Any acceleration in government bond issuance could help boost total social financing (TSF), a broad measure of credit and liquidity. Outstanding TSF was 9.0% higher at the end-September than a year earlier, the same as seen at end-August.翻译:政府债券发行的任何加速都可能有助于提高社会融资总额（TSF），这是衡量信贷和流动性的广泛指标。 9 月底未偿社会融资规模较去年同期增长 9.0%，与 8 月底相同。

In October, TSF is expected to fall to 1.9 trillion yuan from 4.12 trillion yuan in September, the poll showed.翻译:调查显示，10月份社会融资规模预计将从9月份的4.12万亿元降至1.9万亿元。

($1 = 7.2841 Chinese yuan renminbi)翻译:（1 美元 = 7.2841 人民币）

Reporting by Judy Hua and Kevin Yao; Editing by Christian Schmollinger翻译:Judy Hua 和 Kevin Yao 报道；克里斯蒂安·施莫林格编辑

item.title: 油价小幅上涨；市场摆脱中国通胀数据的影响，关注新的驱动因素
item.description:
Oil prices edged up on Thursday as markets shrugged off deflationary indicators in China and looked for further clues on the status of demand from the world's two biggest oil consumers.翻译:周四油价小幅上涨，市场摆脱了中国通货紧缩指标的影响，并寻求有关全球最大两个石油消费国需求状况的进一步线索。

Brent crude futures rose 67 cents, or 0.8%, to $80.21 a barrel by 0730 GMT. U.S. West Texas Intermediate (WTI) crude futures climbed 56 cents, or 0.7%, at $75.89 a barrel.翻译:截至 GMT 0730，布伦特原油期货上涨 67 美分，至每桶 80.21 美元，涨幅为 0.8%。美国西德克萨斯中质原油 (WTI) 原油期货上涨 56 美分，涨幅 0.7%，至每桶 75.89 美元。

The uptick came after both benchmarks fell more than 2% to their lowest since mid-July on Wednesday, as worry over possible supply disruptions in the Middle East eased and concern over U.S. and Chinese demand intensified.翻译:周三，由于对中东可能出现的供应中断的担忧有所缓解，以及对美国和中国需求的担忧加剧，两个基准指数均下跌逾 2%，至 7 月中旬以来的最低水平，导致价格上涨。

"The more subdued gains still reflect reservations in place, with macroeconomic factors and technicals giving sellers the upper hand for now," said Yeap Jun Rong, a market strategist at IG.翻译:IG市场策略师Yeap Jun Rong表示，“涨幅较为疲软仍然反映了保留情绪，宏观经济因素和技术面目前让卖家占据上风。”

Thursday's gains likely reflect an attempt for prices to stabilise after the strong sell-off in previous days, said Yeap.翻译:耶普表示，周四的上涨可能反映出价格在前几天的强劲抛售之后试图稳定下来。

Meanwhile, China inflation data released on Thursday showed that October CPI fell 0.2% year on year, while PPI data fell 2.6% year on year. This was broadly in line with a Reuters' poll that forecast CPI would fall 0.1% and PPI 2.7%.翻译:与此同时，周四公布的中国通胀数据显示，10月份CPI同比下降0.2%，PPI数据同比下降2.6%。这与路透社的民意调查大致一致，预测 CPI 将下降 0.1%，PPI 将下降 2.7%。

Earlier in the week, customs data showed that China's total exports of goods and services contracted faster than expected, although its crude imports in October were robust.翻译:本周早些时候，海关数据显示，尽管 10 月份的原油进口强劲，但中国的商品和服务出口总额收缩速度快于预期。

On the plus side for oil demand, central bank governor Pan Gongsheng said China was expected to achieve its annual growth target of 5% for this year.翻译:央行行长潘功胜表示，从石油需求的积极一面来看，中国今年预计将实现5% 的年度增长目标。

For the United States, inventory data may indicate a weakening in demand. U.S. crude oil inventories increased by 11.9 million barrels over the week to Nov. 3, sources said, citing American Petroleum Institute figures.翻译:对于美国来说，库存数据可能表明需求疲软。消息人士援引美国石油协会的数据称，截至 11 月 3 日当周，美国原油库存增加 1190 万桶。

If confirmed, this would represent the biggest weekly build since February. The U.S. Energy Information Administration (EIA), however, has delayed release of weekly oil inventory data until Nov. 15 for a system upgrade.翻译:如果得到证实，这将是自二月份以来最大的单周涨幅。然而，由于系统升级，美国能源信息署 (EIA) 将每周石油库存数据推迟至 11 月 15 日发布。

Barclays on Wednesday cut its 2024 Brent crude price forecast by $4 to $93 a barrel, citing resilient U.S. oil supply and higher output from Venezuela following the relaxation of sanctions on the Latin American producer.翻译:巴克莱周三将 2024 年布伦特原油价格预测下调 4 美元，至每桶 93 美元，理由是美国石油供应强劲，且在放松对拉丁美洲生产国的制裁后委内瑞拉产量增加。

Reporting by Andrew Hayley in Beijing and Jeslyn Lerh in Singapore; Editing by Tom Hogue and Stephen Coates翻译:Andrew Hayley 在北京和 Jeslyn Lerh 在新加坡的报道；汤姆·霍格和斯蒂芬·科茨编辑
item.author: Jeslyn Lerh

item.title: 中国卫生部门认为反腐运动带来了更好的情绪——高管们
item.description:
Business activities in China's healthcare sector are returning from a sudden near freeze that began in July when Beijing kicked off a year-long anti-corruption campaign, two foreign industry executives said.翻译:两位外国行业高管表示，中国医疗保健行业的商业活动正在从七月份北京启动为期一年的反腐败运动时开始的突然近乎冻结中恢复过来。

The campaign targets the bribing of doctors in drug and medical equipment sales and marks a sharp escalation of an anti-corruption drive in the sector that started years ago. The latest campaign has sent a chill through the sector, pummeling healthcare stocks and prompting some firms to cancel IPOs.翻译:该行动的目标是在药品和医疗设备销售中贿赂医生，标志着多年前开始的该行业反腐败运动的急剧升级。最新的行动给整个行业带来了寒意，医疗保健股遭受重创，并促使一些公司取消首次公开募股。

"We see a recovery in terms of engagements ... we see an improvement in that area," Zafer Unluer, China president of U.S. healthcare company Organon (OGN.N), told Reuters on the sidelines of an industry event in Shanghai.翻译:美国医疗保健公司 Organon (OGN.N)中国区总裁 Zafer Unluer 在上海举行的一次行业活动间隙对路透表示：“我们看到参与度有所回升……我们看到该领域有所改善。”

"It is still as not high as before, but we see a bit of a balancing act."翻译:“它仍然不像以前那么高，但我们看到了一些平衡行为。”

The anti-graft drive initially caused huge business disruptions and many multinational pharmaceutical firms lost engagement with hospitals, executives said.翻译:高管们表示，反腐运动最初造成了巨大的业务中断，许多跨国制药公司失去了与医院的合作。

"We’ve seen some disruption in the ability of our medical representatives to visit hospitals, in our ability to implement some medical application activities," Larry Merizalde, China CEO of South African drugmaker Aspen (APNJ.J), told Reuters.翻译:南非制药商阿斯彭（APNJ.J）中国区首席执行官拉里·梅里扎德（Larry Merizalde）对路透社表示：“我们发现我们的医疗代表访问医院的能力以及实施一些医疗应用活动的能力受到了一些干扰。”

AstraZeneca (AZN.L), the largest foreign drugmaker in China, said on Thursday sales in China grew just 1% in the third quarter, partly impacted by "reduced promotional activities following the government campaign announced at the end of July".翻译:中国最大的外国制药商阿斯利康(AZN.L)周四表示，第三季度在华销售额仅增长 1%，部分原因是“7 月底宣布的政府行动后促销活动减少”。

The two executives said the overall mood, however, had improved over the past two months following communications such as a National Health Commission Q&A and a presentation from a government official.翻译:不过，两位高管表示，在国家卫生健康委员会的问答和政府官员的演讲等沟通之后，过去两个月的整体情绪有所改善。

"Over the last month, since the latest announcements from the government to clarify the objectives of this anti-corruption policy, we see that overall activities are coming back to normal," Merizalde said.翻译:梅里扎德说：“上个月，自从政府最新宣布澄清反腐败政策的目标以来，我们看到整体活动正在恢复正常。”

China is one of the biggest healthcare markets for global healthcare companies but their business sentiment has turned fragile this year due to factors including the anti-graft drive.翻译:中国是全球医疗保健公司最大的医疗保健市场之一，但由于反腐等因素，今年他们的商业信心变得脆弱。

Reporting by Andrew Silver; Editing by Miyoung Kim, Robert Birsel翻译:安德鲁·西尔弗报道；编辑：Miyoung Kim、Robert Birsel
item.author: Andrew Silver

item.title: 农化集团先正达表示明年可能进行 100 亿美元的 IPO
item.description:
Swiss agrochemicals company Syngenta said on Thursday it was still planning to complete its $10 billion flotation, but indicated weak financial markets made it more likely it will take place next year.翻译:瑞士农化公司先正达周四表示，仍计划完成其 100 亿美元的上市，但表示疲软的金融市场使其更有可能在明年进行。

The Chinese-owned company said it was also exploring "alternative methods" to expand its shareholder base as the seeds and pesticides maker seeks to raise cash to fund organic growth and pay down debt.翻译:这家中资公司表示，该公司还在探索“替代方法”来扩大股东基础，因为这家种子和农药制造商寻求筹集现金，为有机增长提供资金并偿还债务。

"Given weak market conditions we expect that the company will IPO by the end of next year," a company spokesman said on Thursday after Syngenta reported its Q3 earnings.翻译:“鉴于市场状况疲弱，我们预计该公司将在明年底前首次公开募股，”公司发言人周四在先正达公布第三季度收益后表示。

"We will also remain flexible in our approach and explore alternative methods to expanding our shareholder base," he said.翻译:他表示：“我们还将保持灵活的做法，并探索扩大股东基础的替代方法。”

The IPO update came as Syngenta, which competes with U.S. company Corteva (CTVA.N) and German firms BASF (BASFn.DE) and Bayer (BAYGn.DE), reported its latest earnings.翻译:此次 IPO 更新发布之际，先正达 (Syngenta) 公布了最新财报，该公司的竞争对手包括美国公司 Corteva (CTVA.N) 、德国公司巴斯夫(BASFn.DE)和拜耳(BAYGn.DE) 。

Sales in the three months to the end of September fell 13% to $6.8 billion, while earnings before interest, tax, depreciation and amortisation plunged 68% to $300 million.翻译:截至 9 月底的三个月销售额下降 13% 至 68 亿美元，而息税折旧摊销前利润下降 68% 至 3 亿美元。

Earnings were hit by weak demand in Brazil, one of Syngenta's biggest markets, where it also wrote down the value of part of its inventory.翻译:先正达最大市场之一巴西的需求疲软打击了盈利，该公司还减记了部分库存的价值。

The IPO remained the favoured option, the spokesman said, declining to comment on possible alternatives such as a private placement of shares.翻译:该发言人表示，首次公开募股仍然是最受欢迎的选择，但拒绝就私募股权等可能的替代方案发表评论。

Syngenta, which recently announced a change of chief executive and chief financial officer, has been pursuing an IPO for nearly two and half years.翻译:先正达最近宣布更换首席执行官和首席财务官，近两年半以来一直在寻求IPO。

Its application passed a review by the listing committee of the Shanghai Stock Exchange in June, but still needs approval from China's securities regulator.翻译:其申请于6月通过了上海证券交易所上市委员会的审核，但仍需中国证券监管机构的批准。

Syngenta was bought by ChemChina in 2017 for $43 billion and folded it into Sinochem Holdings Corp in 2021.翻译:先正达于2017年被中国化工以430亿美元收购，并于2021年并入中化控股公司。

The Chinese parent is pursuing a flotation that is expected to give the company an enterprise value of about $60 billion.翻译:这家中国母公司正在寻求上市，预计将使该公司的企业价值达到约 600 亿美元。

Sinochem is expected to keep a majority stake in the business, with cash raised going towards funding organic growth, research and development, and acquisitions.翻译:预计中化集团将保留该业务的多数股权，筹集的现金将用于资助有机增长、研发和收购。

item.title: 小米新机销量强劲，中国智能手机市场回暖
item.description:
Xiaomi's (1810.HK) sales of more than 1 million units of its latest flagship smartphone in the week since its launch are a fresh sign that a slump in China's phone market could be nearing an end, analysts said.翻译:分析师表示，小米（1810.HK）最新旗舰智能手机自推出以来一周内销量超过 100 万部，这是中国手机市场低迷可能即将结束的新迹象。

Demand in the world's biggest smartphone market has long been in decline, with the COVID-19 pandemic and then a faltering economic recovery persuading customers to wait longer before upgrading their phones.翻译:全球最大智能手机市场的需求长期以来一直在下降，原因是新冠肺炎 (COVID-19) 疫情以及随后的经济复苏步履蹒跚，迫使客户在升级手机之前等待更长时间。

"Sales of the Mi 14 series have exceeded 1 million units and the phones are still in severe short supply," Xiaomi Chief Executive Lei Jun wrote on the microblogging platform Weibo this week.翻译:小米首席执行官雷军本周在微博平台上写道：“小米14系列销量已突破100万台，但手机仍严重供不应求。”

The model went on sale in China on Oct. 31. It uses Qualcomm's cutting-edge Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 processor and Xiaomi's proprietary HyperOS software.翻译:该机型于10月31日在中国上市。它采用高通尖端的Snapdragon 8 Gen 3处理器和小米专有的HyperOS软件。

The robust launch "reinforces signs of the market bottoming out," said Will Wong, an analyst with industry research firm IDC.翻译:行业研究公司 IDC 的分析师 Will Wong 表示，此次强劲的推出“强化了市场触底的迹象”。

It comes on the heels of a big jump in sales for Huawei (HWT.UL) as shoppers snapped up its Mate 60 series phones - a comeback for the company after the U.S. imposed export controls on it in 2019.翻译:此前，随着消费者抢购华为 Mate 60 系列手机，华为 (HWT.UL) 的销量大幅增长，这是该公司在 2019 年美国对其实施出口管制后卷土重来。

IDC predicts the Chinese market is on track to achieve year-on-year sales growth in the fourth quarter after ten consecutive quarters of decline. It did not specify the level of growth.翻译:IDC预计，中国市场在连续十个季度下滑后，第四季度有望实现销售额同比增长。它没有具体说明增长水平。

U.S. chip designer Qualcomm also said last week that it is seeing strong demand from smartphone companies, especially in China.翻译:美国芯片设计商高通公司上周也表示，它看到智能手机公司的强劲需求，尤其是在中国。

The Mi 14 series, priced between 3,999 yuan and 6,499 yuan ($550-$890), represents an attempt by Xiaomi to make deeper inroads into the premium smartphone market and compete with Apple (AAPL.O) and Huawei.翻译:Mi 14系列的售价在3,999元至6,499元（550-890美元）之间，代表着小米进一步进军高端智能手机市场并与苹果（AAPL.O）和华为竞争的尝试。

($1 = 7.2856 Chinese yuan)翻译:（1 美元 = 7.2856 人民币）

Reporting by Yelin Mo and Brenda Goh; Editing by Edwina Gibbs翻译:莫叶琳和吴布伦达报道；编辑：埃德温娜·吉布斯

item.title: 随着复苏的摇摆不定，中国的消费者价格再次下降
item.description:
Summary:
  • Oct CPI -0.2% y/y vs 0.0% in Sep
  • Oct CPI -0.1% m/m vs +0.2% in Sep
  • Oct PPI -2.6% y/y vs -2.5% in Sep
翻译:概括：
  • 10 月 CPI 同比为 -0.2%，9 月为 0.0%
  • 10 月 CPI 环比为 -0.1%，9 月为 +0.2%
  • 10 月 PPI 同比为 -2.6%，9 月为 -2.5%

China's consumer prices swung lower in October, as key gauges of domestic demand pointed to weakness not seen since the pandemic, while factory-gate deflation deepened, casting doubts over the chances of a broad-based economic recovery.翻译:中国十月份的消费者价格下跌，因为国内需求的关键指标显示出自大流行以来未见的疲软，而工厂门口的通货紧缩加剧，使人们对广泛的经济复苏的机会产生了怀疑。

The consumer price index (CPI) dropped 0.2% in October from a year earlier and slipped 0.1% from September, data from the National Bureau of Statistics (NBS) showed on Thursday.翻译:国家统计局周四公布的数据显示，10月份居民消费价格指数（CPI）同比下降0.2%，环比下降0.1%。

The declines undershot the median 0.1% year-on-year fall and flat month-on-month reading predicted in a Reuters poll. Both indicators were last negative at the same time in November 2020 during the COVID-19 pandemic.翻译:跌幅低于路透调查预测的同比跌幅中值 0.1% 和环比持平。这两项指标最后一次同时为负数是在 2020 年 11 月 COVID-19 大流行期间。

The headline figure was dragged by a further slump in pork prices, down 30.1%, speeding up from a 22% slide in September, amid an oversupply of pigs and weak demand.翻译:总体数据受到猪肉价格进一步下跌的拖累，在生猪供应过剩和需求疲软的情况下，猪肉价格下跌 30.1%，较 9 月份的 22% 降幅有所加快。

However, even core inflation, which excludes food and fuel prices, slowed to 0.6% in October from 0.8% in September, pointing to China's continued battle with disinflationary forces and the risk of again missing the government's full-year headline inflation target, set at around 3%.翻译:然而，即使是不包括食品和燃料价格的核心通胀率，也从 9 月的 0.8% 放缓至 10 月的 0.6%，这表明中国仍在继续与通货紧缩力量作斗争，并且有再次达不到政府设定的全年总体通胀目标的风险。 3%左右。

Consumer prices slipped into deflation in July and returned to positive territory in August but were flat in September. Factory deflation persisted for the 13th straight month in October.翻译:消费者价格在 7 月份陷入通货紧缩，并在 8 月份恢复正值，但 9 月份持平。 10 月份工厂通货紧缩已连续第 13 个月持续。

Combined with other economic indicators, the data in the fourth-quarter so far suggests a meaningful recovery in the world's second-largest economy remains elusive.翻译:结合其他经济指标，第四季度迄今为止的数据表明，世界第二大经济体的有意义的复苏仍然难以实现。

"The data shows combating persistent disinflation amid weak demand remains a challenge for Chinese policymakers," said Bruce Pang, chief economist at Jones Lang Lasalle.翻译:仲量联行首席经济学家布鲁斯·庞表示：“数据显示，在需求疲软的情况下应对持续的通货紧缩仍然是中国政策制定者面临的挑战。”

"An appropriate policy mix and more supportive measures are needed to prevent the economy from a downward drift in inflation expectations that could threaten business confidence and household spending."翻译:“需要采取适当的政策组合和更多的支持性措施，以防止经济出现通胀预期下滑，从而威胁企业信心和家庭支出。”

Month-on-month, CPI fell 0.1%, compared with a 0.2% gain in September.翻译:环比来看，CPI下降0.1%，而9月份上涨0.2%。

The producer price index (PPI) fell 2.6% year-on-year against a 2.5% drop in September. Economists had predicted a 2.7% fall in October.翻译:生产者出厂价格指数（PPI）同比下降2.6%，9月份为下降2.5%。经济学家此前预测 10 月份将下降 2.7%。

Authorities have repeatedly downplayed the risks.翻译:当局一再淡化这些风险。

"There is no deflation in China and there will be no deflation in the future," said a statistics bureau official in August.翻译:“中国不存在通缩，未来也不会出现通货紧缩，”国家统计局官员8月份表示。

Beijing has been ramping up measures to support the broader economy, including 1 trillion yuan ($137.43 billion) in sovereign bond issuance and a move to allow local governments to frontload part of their 2024 bond quotas.翻译:北京一直在加大力度支持更广泛的经济，包括发行1万亿元人民币（1,374.3亿美元）的主权债券，以及允许地方政府预付部分2024年债券配额。

But a property crisis, local debt risks and policy divergence with the West all complicate the recovery process.翻译:但房地产危机、地方债务风险以及与西方的政策分歧都使复苏进程变得复杂。

Recent indicators of the economy have been mixed.翻译:最近的经济指标好坏参半。

China's imports unexpectedly grew in October while exports contracted at a quicker pace. Meanwhile, the official purchasing managers' index showed factory activity unexpectedly contracting and services activity slowing last month.翻译:10月份中国进口意外增长，而出口则加速收缩。与此同时， 官方采购经理人指数显示上个月工厂活动意外收缩，服务业活动放缓。

China also recorded its first-ever quarterly deficit in foreign direct investment (FDI), underlining capital outflow pressure following Western governments' "de-risking" moves.翻译:中国还首次出现外国直接投资（FDI） 季度赤字，凸显了西方政府“去风险”举措后的资本外流压力。

"We expect China's economy to grow by 5.0% in 2023, in accordance with the target set by authorities, followed by 4.0% growth in 2024 and 2025," said Moody's on Thursday.翻译:穆迪周四表示：“根据当局设定的目标，我们预计中国经济将在 2023 年增长 5.0%，随后在 2024 年和 2025 年增长 4.0%。”

"However, we see downside risks to China's trend growth on account of structural factors."翻译:“然而，由于结构性因素，我们认为中国的趋势增长存在下行风险。”

Reporting Liangping Gao, Ella Cao and Ryan Woo; Editing by Sam Holmes翻译:报道高亮平、Ella Cao 和 Ryan Woo；山姆·霍姆斯编辑

item.title: 改善澳大利亚与中国的关系有助于太平洋岛国——巴布亚新几内亚部长
item.description:
Pacific Islands nations that want closer economic ties with Beijing will benefit from improved relations between Australia and China, Papua New Guinea's minister for state Justin Tkachenko said on Thursday.翻译:巴布亚新几内亚国务部长贾斯汀·特卡琴科周四表示，希望与北京建立更密切经济关系的太平洋岛国将受益于澳大利亚和中国改善的关系。

Attending the Pacific Islands Forum on the Cook islands, Tkachenko said Papua New Guinea was "very happy Australia had good outcomes" from Prime Minister Anthony Albanese's visit this week to China, the first by an Australian leader in seven years after a diplomatic freeze.翻译:特卡琴科在库克群岛出席太平洋岛屿论坛时表示，巴布亚新几内亚对澳大利亚总理安东尼·阿尔巴内塞本周对中国的访问“取得了良好成果感到非常高兴”，这是外交冻结七年来澳大利亚领导人的首次访问。

"China is an important player and partner in our country economically and physically. Now that Australia is coming back on board with China in a major way, it's a good outcome for the Pacific," he told Reuters by telephone.翻译:他在电话中对路透表示：“中国在经济和实体方面都是我们国家的重要参与者和合作伙伴。现在澳大利亚正在大力与中国合作，这对太平洋地区来说是一个很好的结果。”

PNG struck a defence cooperation agreement with the United States in May, amid concern by Washington and Canberra over Beijing's security ambitions in the Pacific Islands, where China has policing deals with Solomon Islands and Vanuatu.翻译:由于华盛顿和堪培拉对北京在太平洋岛屿的安全野心感到担忧，巴布亚新几内亚于五月与美国达成了一项防务合作协议，中国与所罗门群岛和瓦努阿图在这些岛屿上达成了警务协议。

Australia is PNG's largest aid donor, and the biggest donor across the Pacific region.翻译:澳大利亚是巴布亚新几内亚最大的援助国，也是整个太平洋地区最大的捐助国。

PNG Prime Minister James Marape visited Beijing last month, as the resource-rich but largely undeveloped nation also seeks closer trade ties with China.翻译:巴布亚新几内亚总理詹姆斯·马拉佩上个月访问了北京，这个资源丰富但基本上不发达的国家也寻求与中国建立更密切的贸易关系。

"When Australia is working closely with China it helps us and makes it easier for the Pacific," Tkachenko added.翻译:特卡琴科补充道：“当澳大利亚与中国密切合作时，这对我们有帮助，也让太平洋地区的事情变得更加容易。”

The meeting of the Pacific Islands Forum regional bloc had discussed climate change, regional security and the economy, Albanese told reporters on Thursday in the Cook Islands, where 18 member nations will hold meetings through to Friday.翻译:阿尔巴尼斯周四在库克群岛告诉记者，太平洋岛屿论坛区域集团会议讨论了气候变化、区域安全和经济问题，18 个成员国将在库克群岛举行会议，会议持续至周五。

Australia, one of the world's largest exporters of coal and gas, has committed to reduce emissions by 43 per cent by 2030 and to reach net zero by 2050, but has come under pressure from some Pacific Islands nations to do more to combat climate change by phasing out fossil fuels. China is its largest resources customer.翻译:澳大利亚是世界上最大的煤炭和天然气出口国之一，承诺到 2030 年将排放量减少 43%，到 2050 年实现净零排放，但受到一些太平洋岛屿国家的压力，要求其采取更多措施应对气候变化。逐步淘汰化石燃料。中国是其最大的资源客户。

Albanese pointed to Australia's A$350m climate infrastructure fund for the Pacific, and told reporters he had spoken at the forum on Australia's plans to transition to producing green steel and aluminium, to develop green hydrogen and build up its critical minerals and rare earths sector.翻译:Albanese提到澳大利亚为太平洋地区设立的3.5亿澳元气候基础设施基金，并告诉记者，他在论坛上谈到了澳大利亚计划转型为生产绿色钢铁和铝、开发绿色氢以及建立其关键矿产和稀土行业。

Pacific Islands Forum members span a combined 30 million square kilometres of ocean between the United States and Asia, and say rising sea levels and worsening storms caused by climate change are their greatest security concern.翻译:太平洋岛屿论坛成员跨越美国和亚洲之间总共3000万平方公里的海洋，并表示气候变化导致的海平面上升和风暴加剧是他们最大的安全担忧。

China, Taiwan and the United States have also sent delegations to the Cook Islands, among a large group of partners and observers to the forum. Four forum members hold diplomatic ties with Taiwan and not Beijing.翻译:中国、台湾和美国也派出了代表团前往库克群岛，其中包括众多论坛合作伙伴和观察员。四个论坛成员与台湾而非北京建立了外交关系。

Reporting by Kirsty Needham; Editing by Simon Cameron-Moore翻译:科斯蒂·李约瑟报道；西蒙·卡梅伦-摩尔 编辑

item.title: 尽管中国房地产暴跌，亚洲股市仍上涨
item.description:
Asian share markets rallied on Thursday and the dollar firmed, even as global investors again sold off the troubled mainland Chinese property sector.翻译:尽管全球投资者再次抛售陷入困境的中国内地房地产行业，但亚洲股市周四上涨，美元坚挺。

MSCI's broadest index of Asia-Pacific shares outside Japan (.MIAPJ0000PUS) was up 0.1%, and is up 4.3% so far this month.翻译:MSCI 日本以外最广泛的亚太股票指数(.MIAPJ0000PUS)上涨 0.1%，本月迄今已上涨 4.3%。

The yield on benchmark 10-year Treasury notes reached 4.4902% compared with their U.S. close of 4.508% on Wednesday.翻译:基准 10 年期国债收益率达到 4.4902%，而周三美国收盘价为 4.508%。

The two-year yield , which rises with traders' expectations of higher Fed fund rates, touched 4.9277% compared with a U.S. close of 4.936%.翻译:随着交易员对联邦基金利率上升的预期而上升，两年期国债收益率触及4.9277%，而美国收盘价为4.936%。

Australian shares (.AXJO) were up 0.26%, while Japan's Nikkei stock index (.N225) rose 1.53%.翻译:澳大利亚股市(.AXJO)上涨 0.26%，而日本日经股票指数(.N225)上涨 1.53%。

Hong Kong's Hang Seng Index (.HSI) reversed an early gain and was down 0.25% in the afternoon while China's bluechip CSI300 Index (.CSI300) was 0.1% higher.翻译:香港恒生指数(.HSI)扭转早盘涨幅，下午下跌0.25%，而中国蓝筹股沪深300指数(.CSI300)上涨0.1%。

China's troubled property sector is being closely watched on Thursday after most major stocks rallied one day earlier following a Reuters report that Ping An Insurance Group had been asked by the Chinese authorities to take a controlling stake in Country Garden Holdings (2007.HK) .翻译:周四，中国陷入困境的房地产行业受到密切关注，此前一天，路透社报道称，中国当局要求平安保险集团控股碧桂园控股公司（2007.HK），之后大多数主要股票均上涨。

A spokesperson for Ping An (601318.SS) said the company had not been approached by the government and denied the Reuters report that cited four sources familiar with the plan.翻译:中国平安（601318.SS）发言人表示，政府尚未与该公司接洽，并否认了路透社援引四名熟悉该计划的消息人士的报道。

The Hang Seng Mainland Properties Index (.HSMPI) shed 3.73% on Thursday and the Hang Seng Properties Index (.HSNP), which covers Hong Kong developers, was down 0.7%.翻译:恒生内地房地产指数(.HSMPI)周四下跌 3.73%，涵盖香港开发商的恒生房地产指数(.HSNP)下跌 0.7%。

"I think for equities investors, they are still shying away from Chinese property because there are so many unknowns," said Jason Lui, BNP Paribas's Head of APAC Equity & Derivative Strategy.翻译:法国巴黎银行亚太区股票及衍生品策略主管 Jason Lui 表示：“我认为，对于股票投资者来说，他们仍然回避中国房地产，因为存在太多未知因素。”

"It's difficult to ask investors to go back to pre-property downturn days, fundamentally property is going to play a very different role in Chinese economic development going forward.翻译:“很难要求投资者回到房地产低迷之前的日子，从根本上说，房地产将在中国未来的经济发展中发挥非常不同的作用。

"Property needs to stop being a drag on GDP and sentiment so investors can move on to the real growth drivers."翻译:“房地产需要停止拖累国内生产总值和市场情绪，这样投资者才能转向真正的增长动力。”

In early European trades, the pan-region Euro Stoxx 50 futures were up 0.1%, German DAX futures were down 0.05%, FTSE futures were down 0.16% at 7,401.5,翻译:欧洲早盘，泛区欧洲斯托克50指数期货上涨0.1%，德国DAX期货下跌0.05%，富时指数期货下跌0.16%至7,401.5，

U.S. stock futures, the S&P 500 e-minis , were down 0.06% at 4,396.8.翻译:美国股指期货（S&P 500 e-minis）下跌 0.06%，至 4,396.8 点。

Chinese inflation figures for October published on Thursday showed a 0.1% decline compared to September and a 0.2% fall from one year, according to official statistics.翻译:根据官方统计数据，周四公布的中国 10 月份通胀数据显示，较 9 月份下降 0.1%，较上年下降 0.2%。

The dollar dropped 0.03% against the yen to 150.93 . It is moving back towards its high this year of 151.74 on Oct. 31.翻译:美元兑日元下跌0.03%至150.93。该指数将于 10 月 31 日回升至今年高点 151.74。

The European single currency was up 0.0% on the day at $1.0708, having gained 1.25% in a month, while the dollar index , which tracks the greenback against a basket of currencies of other major trading partners, was up at 105.51.翻译:欧洲单一货币当天上涨0.0%至1.0708美元，一个月内上涨1.25%，而追踪美元兑其他主要贸易伙伴一篮子货币的美元指数上涨至105.51。

The dollar has rebounded from last week's sharp sell-off on rising confidence the Fed has ended raising rates. There is less agreement on whether a rate cut is on the horizon with inflation still above the U.S. Federal Reserve's 2% target.翻译:由于美联储结束加息的信心增强，美元已从上周的大幅抛售中反弹。由于通胀仍高于美联储 2% 的目标，关于是否即将降息的共识较少。

On Wall Street, the S&P 500 (.SPX) rose 0.10% and the Nasdaq Composite (.IXIC) added 0.08%. The Dow Jones Industrial Average (.DJI) fell 0.12%.翻译:在华尔街，标准普尔 500 指数(.SPX)上涨 0.10%，纳斯达克综合指数(.IXIC)上涨 0.08%。道琼斯工业平均指数（.DJI）下跌 0.12%。

The S&P 500 rose for the eighth consecutive day, extending its longest win streak in two years.翻译:标准普尔 500 指数连续第八天上涨，延续了两年来最长的连涨势头。

The Federal Reserve last week kept the benchmark overnight interest rate in the current 5.25%-5.50% range and the central bank is due to meet again mid next month.翻译:美联储上周将基准隔夜利率维持在目前的5.25%-5.50%范围内，央行定于下月中旬再次召开会议。

The U.S weekly jobless claims published on Thursday will be closely watched as an indicator of the how the country's labour market is performing. Economists predict claims will reach 219,000 after coming in at 217,000 last week.翻译:周四公布的美国每周初请失业金人数将作为该国劳动力市场表现的指标受到密切关注。经济学家预计， 上周初请失业金人数将达到 217,000 人，之后将达到 219,000 人。

Oil prices slid over 2% on Wednesday to their lowest in more than three months on concerns over waning demand in the U.S. and China.翻译:由于对美国和中国需求减弱的担忧，油价周三下跌超过 2%，跌至三个多月以来的最低水平。

In Asian trading Thursday, U.S. crude ticked up 0.15% to $75.44 a barrel. Brent crude rose to $79.68 per barrel.翻译:周四亚洲交易中，美国原油上涨 0.15%，至每桶 75.44 美元。布伦特原油上涨至每桶 79.68 美元。

Gold was slightly lower. Spot gold was traded at $1948.9332 per ounce.翻译:黄金小幅走低。现货黄金交易价格为每盎司 1948.9332 美元。

item.title: Recco Control 出价 16.4 亿美元将 Hollysys 私有化，高于 Ascendent 出价
item.description:
Recco Control Technology Pte Ltd and Dazheng Group Investment Holdings Company Limited offered to pay $1.64 billion to acquire Hollysys Automation Technologies (HOLI.F), increasing its bid by 6% from what if offered to pay in August, the group told Reuters.翻译:Recco Control Technology Pte Ltd 和 Dazheng Group Investment Holdings Company Limited 向路透社透露，拟支付 16.4 亿美元收购 Hollysys Automation Technologies (HOLI.F) ，其出价比 8 月份提出的出价提高了 6%。

The group has proposed an all-cash offer of $26.50 a share for the automation control system maker, compared with the $25 a share offer it made in August.翻译:该集团已向这家自动化控制系统制造商提出每股 26.50 美元的全现金收购要约，而 8 月份提出的每股收购要约为 25 美元。

The current bid represents a 42% premium to the company's closing price before the group submitted its first bid.翻译:目前的出价较该集团提交首次出价前的收盘价溢价 42%。

The new offer is more than the $1.6 billion takeover bid Hollysys received on Monday from China-focused private equity firm Ascendent Capital Partners which offered to pay $26 per share in cash for the company.翻译:新的收购要约高于和利时周一从专注于中国的私募股权公司 Ascendent Capital Partners 收到的 16 亿美元收购要约，该公司提出以每股 26 美元的现金收购该公司。

The Recco group's decision to raise its offer is "underpinned by our steadfast pursuit of acquiring Hollysys and our motivation to be competitive in a transparent and genuine sale process," Recco director Ke Lei told Reuters.翻译:Recco 董事柯磊告诉路透社，Recco 集团提高报价的决定“基于我们对收购和利时的坚定追求，以及我们在透明和真实的销售过程中保持竞争力的动机”。

"We believe that this offer, which is at a compelling premium, represents an unparalleled opportunity for Hollysys' shareholders to maximize the value of their shares swiftly and with certainty," he said.翻译:他表示：“我们相信，这一溢价令人信服的要约对于和利时的股东来说是一个无与伦比的机会，可以迅速而确定地实现其股票价值的最大化。”

Hollysys' management team proposed a consideration of $25 per share last month and told Reuters on Tuesday the company "is open to serious and compelling offers from all parties."翻译:和利时的管理团队上个月提出每股 25 美元的收购价，并于周二告诉路透社，该公司“对各方提出的认真且令人信服的报价持开放态度”。

It started a formal sales process last month and is being advised by Deutsche Bank (DBKGn.DE).翻译:该公司上个月开始正式销售流程，并得到德意志银行(DBKGn.DE)的建议。

A year ago Hollysys management was ready to take the company private at a $1.8 billion valuation, Reuters reported, but nothing has happened since then.翻译:据路透社报道，一年前和利时管理层准备以 18 亿美元的估值将该公司私有化，但此后什么也没发生。

The 30-year old company, valued at $1.35 billion, operates in four sectors: industrial automation, transportation automation, medical and health care, and energy and environmental protection. Its stock has climbed 30% since January. The company is listed in the United States, incorporated in the British Virgin Islands and headquartered in China.翻译:这家拥有30年历史的公司估值13.5亿美元，业务涉及工业自动化、交通自动化、医疗保健、能源环保四个领域。自 1 月份以来，其股价已上涨 30%。该公司在美国上市，在英属维尔京群岛注册成立，总部位于中国。

(This story has been refiled to correct the spelling of Ascendent in paragraph 4)翻译:（这个故事已被重新归档，以更正第 4 段中 Ascendent 的拼写）

item.title: 台湾在敏感的台湾海峡监视中国航母编队
item.description:
Taiwan's military has sent forces to keep watch on a Chinese naval formation led by the aircraft carrier Shandong sailing through the sensitive Taiwan Strait, Taiwan's defence ministry said on Thursday.翻译:台湾国防部周四表示，台湾军方已派兵监视山东舰率领的中国海军编队穿越敏感的台湾海峡。

The Shandong participated in Chinese military drills around Taiwan in April, and again entered the Pacific last month.翻译:山东舰四月份参加了中国在台湾附近的军事演习，并于上个月再次进入太平洋。

The ministry said in a statement that the formation led by the Shandong entered the narrow Taiwan Strait on Wednesday afternoon sailing in a northerly direction but keeping to the Chinese side of the waterway's median line, an unofficial barrier between the two.翻译:国防部在一份声明中表示，由山东舰率领的编队于周三下午进入狭窄的台湾海峡，向北航行，但保持在水道中线的中国一侧，中线是两者之间的非官方屏障。

China says the Taiwan Strait is not an international waterway and that it alone has sovereignty there, which both Taiwan and the United States dispute. The United States frequently sends warships through the strait, most recently last week, that time accompanied by a Canadian frigate.翻译:中国表示，台湾海峡不是国际水道，只有中国拥有该海峡的主权，台湾和美国对此都存在争议。美国经常派遣军舰通过该海峡，最近一次是上周，当时有一艘加拿大护卫舰随行。

As of Thursday morning, the Chinese carrier group was continuing to sail northwards, Taiwan's defence ministry said. Taiwan has dispatched "appropriate" forces to keep watch, it added, without elaborating.翻译:台湾国防部表示，截至周四上午，中国航母编队仍在继续向北航行。声明补充称，台湾已派出“适当”部队进行警戒，但没有详细说明。

China's defence ministry did not immediately respond to a request for comment.翻译:中国国防部没有立即回应置评请求。

Japan's defence ministry said on Monday that the Shandong and other naval ships had sailed to the South China Sea after conducting landing drills in the Pacific Ocean for nine days.翻译:日本防卫省周一表示，山东舰等海军舰艇在太平洋进行了9天的登陆演习后已驶往南海。

The Shandong, commissioned in 2019, also sailed through the Taiwan Strait in June.翻译:2019年入役的山东舰也于6月穿越了台湾海峡。

Taiwan has repeatedly complained of Chinese air force planes crossing the strait's median line.翻译:台湾多次抱怨中国空军飞机越过海峡中线。

China, which has never renounced the use of force to bring Taiwan under its control, has stepped up military activity near the democratically governed island, responding to what it calls "collusion" between Taiwan and the United States.翻译:中国从未放弃使用武力将台湾置于其控制之下，并加强了在这个民主治理的岛屿附近的军事活动，以回应所谓的台湾与美国之间的“勾结”。

Taiwan's government strongly rejects Beijing's sovereignty claim.翻译:台湾政府强烈拒绝北京的主权主张。

Reporting by Ben Blanchard; Editing by Christopher Cushing & Simon Cameron-Moore翻译:本·布兰查德报道；克里斯托弗·库欣和西蒙·卡梅伦-摩尔编辑
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国要求英国停止“加强”与台湾关系的努力
item.description:
The Chinese government on Thursday told Britain to stop its efforts to "enhance" ties with Taiwan after a high level meeting in London and the signing of a new trade agreement between the island and Britain.翻译:在伦敦举行高层会议以及台湾与英国签署新贸易协定后，中国政府周四告诉英国停止“加强”与台湾关系的努力。

Taiwan and Britain, which like most countries has no formal ties with the Chinese-claimed island, on Wednesday signed a new Enhanced Trade Partnership and British Trade Minister Nigel Huddleston hosted Taiwan Deputy Economy Minister Chen Chern-Chyi for talks in London.翻译:与大多数国家一样，台湾和英国与中国声称拥有主权的岛屿没有正式关系，周三签署了新的增强贸易伙伴关系，英国贸易部长奈杰尔·赫德尔斯顿在伦敦接待了台湾经济部副部长陈振齐进行会谈。

China's embassy in London said in a statement that Beijing has always firmly opposed any form of official contact between countries that have diplomatic relations with China and "China's Taiwan region".翻译:中国驻伦敦大使馆在一份声明中表示，北京一贯坚决反对与中国建交的国家与“中国台湾地区”进行任何形式的官方接触。

"We urge the UK to abide by the one-China principle and stop using trade cooperation as an excuse to engage in official exchanges or enhance substantive relations with Taiwan," it added.翻译:我们敦促英方恪守一个中国原则，停止以贸易合作为借口与台湾进行官方交往或加强实质性关系。”

Britain and Taiwan both maintain de facto embassies in each other's capitals, but London does not officially recognise the democratically elected government in Taipei.翻译:英国和台湾在对方首都都设有事实上的大使馆，但伦敦并不正式承认台北的民选政府。

Taiwan views Britain as an important democratic partner, noting its concern over stepped-up Chinese military activities near the island and its support for Taiwan's participation in global bodies such as the World Health Organization.翻译:台湾将英国视为重要的民主伙伴，指出英国对中国在台湾附近加强军事活动的担忧，并支持台湾参与世界卫生组织等全球机构。

Britain approved a sharp increase in exports of submarine parts and technology last year to Taiwan as it upgrades its naval forces, Reuters reported in March.翻译:据路透社三月份报道，英国去年批准大幅增加向台湾出口潜艇零部件和技术，以升级其海军力量。

Because of its diplomatic isolation and pressure from China, chip powerhouse Taiwan has few formal foreign trade agreements, though it is a member of the World Trade Organization and has free trade agreements with Singapore and New Zealand.翻译:由于外交孤立和来自中国的压力，芯片强国台湾几乎没有正式的对外贸易协定，尽管它是世界贸易组织的成员，并与新加坡和新西兰签订了自由贸易协定。

Reporting by Beijing newsroom; Writing by Ben Blanchard; Editing by Sam Holmes翻译:北京新闻编辑室报道；本·布兰查德 (Ben Blanchard) 撰写；山姆·霍姆斯编辑

item.title: 特斯拉自 11 月 9 日起上调部分更新的长续航车型在中国的价格
item.description:
Tesla Inc (TSLA.O) on Thursday said it raised prices on its refreshed Model 3 and Model Y long-range vehicles in China, starting Nov. 9.翻译:特斯拉公司(TSLA.O)周四表示，从 11 月 9 日起，该公司将提高其在中国更新的 Model 3 和 Model Y 长续航汽车的价格。

The electric vehicle maker will increase the price of its Model 3 version in China by 1,500 yuan ($206), showed its website and official Weibo account.翻译:据其网站和官方微博账户显示，这家电动汽车制造商将在中国将其 Model 3 版本的价格提高 1,500 元（206 美元）。

Tesla sales representatives in China have been posting on social media in the past week about potential price increases of the Model Y, urging consumers to place orders ahead of the increases.翻译:过去一周，特斯拉中国销售代表一直在社交媒体上发布有关 Model Y 可能涨价的消息，敦促消费者在涨价前下订单。

item.title: 华盛顿国家动物园与心爱的大熊猫说再见
item.description:
Washington's National Zoo bid a tearful farewell to its beloved trio of giant pandas on Wednesday as the long-serving goodwill ambassadors to the U.S. capital began a journey back to China that was announced earlier this year.翻译:华盛顿国家动物园周三含泪告别了心爱的三只大熊猫，长期担任驻美国首都的亲善大使开始了今年早些时候宣布的返回中国的旅程。

The bears - Mei Xiang, Tian Tian and their cub Xiao Qi Ji - hunkered down in crates made of steel and plexiglass that were lifted into a truck and then loaded into a Boeing 777F cargo plane dubbed "FedEx Panda Express." They left in the early afternoon from Dulles International Airport with a load of bamboo, apples and pears to munch on during the 19-hour, 9,000 mile flight.翻译:这些熊——“美香”、“甜甜”和它们的幼崽“小七吉”——蹲在钢和有机玻璃制成的板条箱里，这些板条箱被装上卡车，然后装进一架名为“联邦快递熊猫快递”的波音 777F 货机。下午早些时候，他们从杜勒斯国际机场出发，带着一大堆竹子、苹果和梨，在 19 小时、9,000 英里的飞行中享用。

The pandas, accompanied by three zookeepers, will travel to a reserve in China’s mountainous Sichuan province, where an estimated 1,800 pandas are still found in the wild, according to the National Zoo.翻译:据国家动物园称，这些大熊猫将在三名动物园管理员的陪同下前往中国山区四川省的一个保护区，那里估计仍有 1,800 只大熊猫在野外。

Zoo director Brandie Smith choked back tears at a brief ceremony ending more than a half century in which pandas have been residents.翻译:动物园园长布兰迪·史密斯（Brandie Smith）在一场简短的仪式上强忍着泪水，结束了大熊猫半个多世纪以来的生活。

"It's been a hard week, but ultimately our focus today is on the safe transport of these animals to China," she said.翻译:“这是艰难的一周，但最终我们今天的重点是将这些动物安全运输到中国，”她说。

"It's a moment of joy because this is one more step in 50 years of a successful giant panda conservation program and hopefully the beginning of 50 more years of successful giant panda conservation," she said.翻译:她说：“这是一个令人高兴的时刻，因为这是 50 年来大熊猫保护计划成功的又一步，也有望成为 50 年来大熊猫保护成功的开始。”

Mei Xiang, 25, and Tian Tian, 26, arrived at the National Zoo in 2000. Their first three cubs, born between 2005 and 2015, are thriving in China. Xiao Qi Ji - “Little Miracle” in English - was born three years ago, making his mother the oldest giant panda ever to give birth in the U.S.翻译:25 岁的美香和 26 岁的甜甜于 2000 年来到国家动物园。他们的前三只幼崽出生于 2005 年至 2015 年之间，目前在中国茁壮成长。 “小奇姬”——英文“Little Miracle”——三年前出生，这使得他的母亲成为美国有史以来出生年龄最大的大熊猫

Pandas live about 30 years under human care, but about 15-to-20 years in the wild, the zoo said on its website.翻译:动物园在其网站上称，大熊猫在人类照料下的寿命约为 30 年，但在野外的寿命约为 15 至 20 年。

The trio, made famous by the zoo's "Giant Panda Cam" with more than 100 million views, were part of a fading legacy in which giant pandas served as animal ambassadors.翻译:这三人因动物园的“大熊猫摄像机”观看次数超过一亿次而闻名，他们是大熊猫作为动物大使的日渐衰落的遗产的一部分。

It began in 1972, when the government of China presented two giant pandas as gifts to the U.S. after President Richard Nixon's historic Cold War visit to the communist country.翻译:它始于1972年，当时理查德·尼克松总统对这个共产主义国家进行历史性的冷战访问后，中国政府向美国赠送了两只大熊猫作为礼物。

Except for the initial gifts, giant pandas have been leased to U.S. zoos under contracts with the China Wildlife Conservation. In recent years, such contracts have not been extended.翻译:除了最初的礼物外，大熊猫还根据与中国野生动物保护协会的合同租给了美国动物园。近年来，此类合同并未延长。

The departure of Washington's three bears follows the return of pandas from Memphis and San Diego zoos, leaving only four giant pandas in the U.S. Those animals, residents of Georgia's Zoo Atlanta, are scheduled to return in 2024.翻译:华盛顿的三只熊离开后，孟菲斯和圣地亚哥动物园的大熊猫回归，美国只剩下四只大熊猫。这些动物是佐治亚州亚特兰大动物园的居民，计划于 2024 年回归。

It was not clear if or when the zoo will get more pandas.翻译:目前尚不清楚动物园是否或何时会获得更多熊猫。

Kimberly Blalock, a young visitor at the National Zoo on Tuesday, was among the last to see the pandas on display in Washington.翻译:周二，国家动物园的一位年轻游客金伯利·布拉洛克(Kimberly Blalock)是最后一批在华盛顿观看熊猫展示的人之一。

"I hope they can come back," she said. "I'm going to miss them and I want to hug them."翻译:“我希望他们能回来，”她说。 “我会想念他们，我想拥抱他们。”

Reporting by Kevin Fogarty and Kia Johnson in Washington, additional reporting and writing by Rich McKay in Atlanta; Editing by David Gregorio翻译:Kevin Fogarty 和 Kia Johnson 在华盛顿的报道，Rich McKay 在亚特兰大的补充报道和撰写；编辑：大卫·格雷戈里奥
item.author: Kevin Fogarty, Rich Mckay

item.title: 独家：中国当局要求平安控股碧桂园
item.description:
Chinese authorities have asked Ping An Insurance Group to take a controlling stake in embattled Country Garden (2007.HK), the nation's biggest private property developer, four people familiar with the plan said.翻译:四位知情人士称，中国当局已要求平安保险集团控股陷入困境的中国最大的私营房地产开发商碧桂园（2007.HK） 。

China's State Council, which is headed by Premier Li Qiang, has instructed the local government of Guangdong province, where both companies are based, to help arrange a rescue of Country Garden by Ping An, said two of the sources who have direct knowledge of the matter.翻译:两名直接了解情况的消息人士称，以李强总理为首的中国国务院已指示两家公司所在地广东省当地政府帮助安排平安对碧桂园的救助。事情。

A spokesperson for Ping An (601318.SS) said the company had not been approached by the government and denied the information reported by Reuters.翻译:中国平安（601318.SS）发言人表示，政府尚未与该公司接洽，并否认了路透社报道的信息。

Ping An has "not been asked by (the) Government to takeover Country Garden. We categorically deny this story. It is untrue," the company said in a statement to Reuters.翻译:该公司在给路透社的一份声明中表示，平安“没有被政府要求收购碧桂园。我们断然否认这个故事。这是不真实的”。

It reiterated its denial in a public statement after Reuters first published this report.翻译:在路透社首次发表这份报告后，它在一份公开声明中重申了其否认。

A Reuters spokesperson said: “We stand by our reporting.”翻译:路透社发言人表示：“我们坚持我们的报道。”

The insurer, which vies with China Life (601628.SS) for the title of the country's biggest insurance group by market value, declined to make its founder and chairman, Ma Mingzhe, available for an interview. Ma, who also uses the English first name Peter, did not respond to an emailed Reuters request for comment.翻译:这家与中国人寿（601628.SS）争夺中国市值最大保险集团称号的保险公司拒绝接受其创始人兼董事长马明哲的采访。马云也使用英文名彼得，他没有回复路透社通过电子邮件发出的置评请求。

China's State Council Information Office and the Guangdong local government did not respond to requests for comment. Country Garden declined to comment.翻译:中国国务院新闻办公室和广东地方政府没有回应置评请求。碧桂园拒绝置评。

Ping An's Hong Kong-listed shares finished 5.4% lower in heavy trade, wiping about $2.1 billion off its market value. Country Garden shares surged 12.2%, valuing the company at about $3 billion, and stocks of other Chinese developers also jumped.翻译:平安在香港上市的股票在激烈的交投中下跌 5.4% ，市值蒸发约 21 亿美元。碧桂园股价飙升 12.2%，该公司估值约为 30 亿美元，其他中国开发商的股价也大幅上涨。

A state-engineered rescue of Country Garden by Ping An would be one of the most significant interventions to date by authorities to support the cash-squeezed and highly indebted property sector, which accounts for one-quarter of China's economic activity and has sparked fears of a broader financial crisis.翻译:平安对碧桂园的国家计划救助将是迄今为止当局为支持现金紧张且负债累累的房地产行业而采取的最重大干预措施之一，该行业占中国经济活动的四分之一，并引发了人们的担忧更广泛的金融危机。

"If this is true, it will have a very significant positive impact on the property and capital markets," said Xu Tianchen, senior economist at the Economist Intelligence Unit.翻译:“如果这是真的，将对房地产和资本市场产生非常重大的积极影响，”经济学人智库高级经济学家徐天辰表示。

"Only equity injections, such as corporate takeovers or nationalisations, are likely to turn around the confidence of home buyers and investors and materially change the situation."

MITIGATING RISK

Authorities are keen that any risks posed by Country Garden's liquidity problems should not spill over to the wider economy, said three of the sources.翻译:其中三位消息人士表示，当局希望碧桂园的流动性问题带来的任何风险都不应蔓延到更广泛的经济领域。

While in China companies can rarely ignore a request from the central government, the three sources said Ping An has been asked to come up with details of the plan and will have leeway to negotiate terms of any deal.翻译:虽然在中国，企业很少会忽视中央政府的要求，但三位消息人士表示，平安已被要求提供该计划的细节，并将有余地来谈判任何交易的条款。

Talks between authorities and core Ping An leaders began in late August and are still at an early stage, said two of them.翻译:其中两位人士表示，当局与平安核心领导人之间的谈判于 8 月底开始，目前仍处于早期阶段。

Ping An has been asked to conduct due diligence on Country Garden, two sources also said, adding that authorities understood the insurer was a listed company answerable to shareholders.翻译:两位消息人士还表示，平安已被要求对碧桂园进行尽职调查，并补充说，当局了解该保险公司是一家对股东负责的上市公司。

A fifth person with knowledge of the matter said some talks between Ping An and the Guangdong local government about a rescue of Country Garden took place in September.翻译:第五位知情人士称，9月份中国平安与广东地方政府就救助碧桂园进行了一些会谈。

All sources declined to be identified due to the sensitivity of the matter.翻译:由于此事的敏感性，所有消息来源均拒绝透露姓名。

Discussions between Ping An and authorities are being led by officials in the financial markets department of the People's Bank of China (PBOC), which is the central bank, and include Country Garden, said two sources.翻译:两名消息人士称，平安与当局之间的讨论是由中国人民银行（中国人民银行）金融市场部官员主导的，其中包括碧桂园。

The National Financial Regulatory Administration (NFRA) is also involved in the talks, they added.翻译:他们补充说，国家金融监管局（NFRA）也参与了谈判。

Neither the PBOC nor the NFRA responded to Reuters requests for comment.翻译:中国人民银行和国家金融监管局均未回应路透社的置评请求。

Authorities want Ping An to take a stake of more than 50%, according to one person with direct knowledge and one person briefed on the plan.翻译:据一位直接知情人士和一位了解该计划的人士透露，当局希望平安持股超过 50%。

Country Garden's largest shareholder with a stake of about 52% is Yang Huiyan, chairperson and daughter of a co-founder. Reuters was not able to reach Yang for comment.翻译:碧桂园第一大股东为董事长、联合创始人之女杨惠妍，持股约52%。路透社未能联系到杨置评。

If Ping An were to become Country Garden's controlling shareholder, authorities would like it to inject capital in stages to ease the developer's liquidity problems, according to four sources.翻译:四位消息人士称，如果平安成为碧桂园的控股股东，当局希望其分阶段注资，以缓解开发商的流动性问题。

The property developer last month missed a deadline to pay a $15 million coupon and the market has deemed it to be in default on its offshore bonds which total some $11 billion.翻译:上个月，这家房地产开发商错过了支付 1500 万美元息票的最后期限，市场认为该公司拖欠了总额约 110 亿美元的离岸债券。

Country Garden has said it expects to be unable to meet all of its offshore debt obligations and hopes to seek a "holistic" solution to its difficulties.翻译:碧桂园表示，预计无法履行所有离岸债务，并希望寻求“全面”解决方案来解决其困难。

Chinese authorities are eager to make the proposed takeover a possible template for other financially troubled developers, two of the sources also said.

GUANGDONG SOLUTION

Authorities are keen for the Country Garden's liquidity problems to be resolved within Guangdong, three sources said. Ping An was a natural choice because it is based in Guangdong and has been a major Country Garden shareholder, according to two of the sources.翻译:三名消息人士称，当局希望碧桂园的流动性问题能够在广东境内得到解决。两位消息人士称，平安是一个自然选择，因为它总部位于广东，并且一直是碧桂园的主要股东。

Ping An said after Reuters first published this report that it no longer holds Country Garden shares. It held a 4.99% stake as of Aug. 11, according to Hong Kong stock exchange data.翻译:中国平安在路透社首次发布该报道后表示，其不再持有碧桂园股票。根据香港证券交易所数据，截至8月11日，该公司持有4.99%的股份。

A state-engineered takeover of one company by another is not without precedent in China. But there has not been one in the property sector since Beijing flagged measures in 2020 to tackle the industry's very high debt levels, triggering a liquidity crunch.翻译:国家策划的一家公司对另一家公司的收购在中国并非没有先例。但自北京在 2020 年宣布采取措施解决该行业极高的债务水平并引发流动性紧缩以来，房地产行业还没有出台任何措施。

Although many other Chinese property developers, including giant China Evergrande (3333.HK), have defaulted on their debt, policy steps have mostly concentrated on lowering mortgage rates and relaxing rules so that it is easier for people to buy homes.翻译:尽管包括巨头中国恒大（3333.HK）在内的许多其他中国房地产开发商都出现了债务违约，但政策措施主要集中在降低抵押贷款利率和放宽规定，以便人们更容易购房。

But in a sign that governmental authorities are willing to play a bigger role, China Vanke's (000002.SZ) top shareholder, state-owned Shenzhen Metro on Monday said it had prepared 10 billion yuan ($1.4 billion) worth of "market tools" to support the country's No. 2 developer.翻译:但万科(000002.SZ)的最大股东、国有深圳地铁周一表示，已准备了价值 100 亿元人民币（14 亿美元）的“市场工具”，这表明政府当局愿意发挥更大的作用。支持国家第二大开发商。

Country Garden had total liabilities of 1.4 trillion yuan ($190 billion) at the end of June. It has more than 3,000 projects under development nationwide.翻译:截至 6 月底，碧桂园的总负债为 1.4 万亿元人民币（1,900 亿美元）。全国在建项目超过3000个。

Ping An has been tapped by authorities as a rescuer for an ailing company before.翻译:平安此前曾被当局指派为一家陷入困境的公司的救助者。

It participated in state-guided aid for Peking University Founder Group in 2021 and 2022. Its main unit, Ping An Life, was part of a consortium that was involved in restructuring the group's debt and then the unit took 67% ownership of the reorganised company.翻译:2021年和2022年参与北大方正集团国家引导援助，其主体单位平安人寿是参与集团债务重组的财团成员，后持有重组后公司67%的股权。
